name: Official Phaser Web Game
description:
This is a game that I created from the official Phaser website. This wasn't my idea Hence I don't deserve all the credits for this game.

If you are a coder or you just want to create this game for yourself, then click the link to visit their website and follow the instructions.

Link for Phaser: https://phaser.io/

Link for creating the game yourself: https://phaser.io/tutorials/making-your-first-phaser-3-game/part1

Tip: Play the game on fullscreen mode.

That's it!
